column4: My Ubuntu machine keeps rebooting its self after say, 3/4 hours of uptime. Where can I look for possible causes? I don't think it's something over heating as my hardware hasn't changed and I think it would overheat a lot sooner.
Where should I look for possible causes?
Where are system logs kept? I need to review them to see why my machine is rebooting its self. There's no good, obviouse reason for this.
